str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Isaiah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Hesaias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A root, shoot, source; that which comes from the root, a descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'root'.
(Hebrew), Jesse, son of Obed, and father of King David. Of Hebrew origin; Jessae, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.
To reign, rule. A primary verb; to be first.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
